ODIN_HQ.aceNotes: ACE Advanced Medical enabled. Odin staff may carry extra medical/admin items per mission.
ODIN_HQ.tfarNotes: Company net LR 70.0; monitor platoon nets as required.

SL.notes: Command & Support baseline. Maintain consistent mags count with fireteam. Controls squad net; confirms ROE & PID.

TL.notes: Command & Support baseline. Maintain consistent mags count with fireteam. Leads fireteam manoeuvre and reports contacts.

AR.notes: Command & Support baseline. Maintain consistent mags count with fireteam. Establishes support-by-fire; conserve belts.

AAR.notes: Command & Support baseline. Maintain consistent mags count with fireteam. Feeds AR and covers reloads.

Medic.notes: Command & Support baseline. Maintain consistent mags count with fireteam. Triage and CASEVAC coordinator.

RTO.notes: Command & Support baseline. Maintain consistent mags count with fireteam. Manages LR comms, relays to higher/air.

AT.notes: Command & Support baseline. Maintain consistent mags count with fireteam. Engage armour only on SL/PL call unless imminent threat.

FREYJA_PLT.aceNotes: Standard ACE settings. PL/PSG carry map tools and additional smokes.

JRAB_1SQD.aceNotes: CLS items for all; Medic carries full kit.
JRAB_1SQD.tfarNotes: Squad SR: 55.1. Fireteams use TFAR channels 1–4 for intra-team.

HYDRA_PLT.tfarNotes: Platoon net 60.0. Consider underwater comms per mission.

HEIMDALL_SRR.aceNotes: Recon may use suppressed weapons and extra optics.
HEIMDALL_SRR.tfarNotes: Recon net 52.0; maintain comms discipline and short transmissions.

SIERRA_RAF.aceNotes: Aircrew use ACE hearing protection and GPS tools; JTAC carries designator.
SIERRA_RAF.tfarNotes: Air net 75.0 LR. JTAC monitors ground net as assigned.
